room_title: Escape room "Game of Swords" by Planet Escape Room in Los Angeles
room_description:
The Dark Lord Axius, bent on destruction and dominion of the living, is leading his army of the wicked to lay waste to the castle. Once he retrieves the sacred stone of power hidden within, the sun will hide and the dead will rise.
However, the prophecy states that a band of heroes with the ability to unite the four kingdoms may find it first and use its power to vanquish Axius. Foolish adventurers who have deemed themselves worthy have searched the castle's sanctum, but soon go mad. Will you share the same fate, or are you the heroes the prophecy spoke of?
